snippet: The visuals for “Tide: The Paradox Effect,” the second single from Richard’s sophomore album, “Blackheart,” find Richard embodied by an animated, Joan of Arc-esque gladiator who battles galactic forces to reach the sun.
abstract: The visuals for “Tide: The Paradox Effect,” the second single from Richard’s sophomore album, “Blackheart,” find Richard embodied by an animated, Joan of Arc-esque gladiator who battles galactic forces to reach the sun.

headline.main: A Stylish, Futuristic New Music Video From the R&B Singer Dawn Richard
